name: On Rose-Golden Pond: Paradise Killer
description:
This interactive essay is about Kaizen Game Works' 2020 game Paradise Killer, which I hope everyone checks out. It's my favorite game of 2020 and has haunted my thoughts since I first played it. I'd love to hear your ideas about this game -- feel free to get in touch. (As of press time, it's even 25% off.)

Thanks to my friends and acquaintances who offered their thoughts on perfection.

This piece contains some spoilers, but honestly, this game is . . . very hard to really spoil and has to be experienced. But please play it first if that's what you want.
